oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Super-A-polynomials for twist knots
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAWATA, S
RAMADEVI, P
ZODINMAWIA
SUN, XY
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chern-Simons Theories
Topological Field Theories
Topological Strings
CHERN-SIMONS THEORY
3-MANIFOLD INVARIANTS
TOPOLOGICAL STRINGS
FIELD-THEORY
LINKS
FORMULA
ALGEBRAS
HOMOLOGY

VOLUME
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We conjecture formulae of the colored superpolynomials for a class of twist knots K-p where p denotes the number of full twists. The validity of the formulae is checked by applying differentials and taking special limits. Using the formulae, we compute both the classical and quantum super-A-polynomials for the twist knots with small values of p. The results support the categorified versions of the generalized volume conjecture and the quantum volume conjecture. Furthermore, we obtain the evidence that the Q-deformed A-polynomials can be identified with the augmentation polynomials of knot contact homology in the case of the twist knots.
